# libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# data

```{r}
files<-list.files(path = "jumping_data_parker/",
                              pattern = "*.csv",
                               full.names = TRUE)

```

```{r}
convert_columns<-function(file){
  file<-file%>%
    mutate(sex = case_when(sex==FALSE ~ "F",
                          sex == "M" ~ "M"),
           date = as.character(date))
}
```
```{r}
raw_data<-map(files, read_csv)%>%
  map(convert_columns)%>%
  bind_rows()
```
```{r}
raw_data%>%
  group_by(distance)%>%
  summarise(succ_rate = sum(outcome==1))
```
